Child Development

The first topic we will cover in this training is child development.

Although our focus will be on ages birth to five, we will also discuss the development of children up to 12 years old.

The topics that will be covered in this section include:

Growth Patterns

Early Brain Development

Developmental Milestones

Developmental Monitoring & Screening

Early Intervention Service

Developmental Disabilities

What Child Care Providers Can Do
